columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the route table

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a route table uniquely

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated

columns.name: disable_bgp_route_propagation
columns.description: Indicates Whether to disable the routes learned by BGP on that route table. True means disable.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the route table resource

columns.name: routes
columns.description: A list of routes contained within a route table

columns.name: subnets
columns.description: A list of references to subnets
